member.name: T:Senkel.VideoGame.Settings.Serialization.SettingConverter
member.summary: Represents a json converter that is capable of serializing/deserializing setting renders.

member.name: M:Senkel.VideoGame.Settings.Serialization.SettingConverter.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Type})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class that can write json data and read json data using a specified definition.
member.param: The definition to use for reading json data.

member.name: F:Senkel.VideoGame.Settings.Serialization.SettingConverter.Definition
member.summary: Pairs the names of the settings to the type of the corresponding setting value.
